ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 26
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Also, I just discovered the Temple Of Life in Queynos has a nice selection of spells, including some you can t buy in the Wizard Guild of Queynos.  I saw
ygData.messageBody:
> On Sat, 24 Apr 1999, Gooey Smalls wrote:
> > As for Wizard spells the library and tower of the
> > crimson hands in Erudin have a HUGE selction of spells,
> in fact the only
> > spell i have'nt found is eye of zomm. Hope this helps
> whomever asked.

Also, I just discovered the Temple Of Life in Queynos has a nice
selection of spells, including some you can't buy in the Wizard Guild
of Queynos. I saw Halo Of Life in the Temple but not in the Guild.
Of course, as I said before, Erudites get better prices in Erudin.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
